sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Maneuver) The character may make a Coordinated Assault maneuver. If he does so, a number of allies engaged with him equal to his ranks in Leadership gain 1 advantage on combat checks they make until the beginning of the character's next turn. The range of this maneuver increases by one band per rank of Coordinated Assault.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Coordinated Assault</name> <number>TAL0001270</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-12 03:55:46</sys_created_on> <sys_id>13ed6b2b2f9ca090e0f497eef699b616</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-12 03:55:46</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
